elements.title: Kirkby train crash
elements.contents: ... that the train driver in the Kirkby train crash (pictured) was found to have been using his mobile phone before the collision?

elements.title: For Your Validation
elements.contents: ... that a tour promoting the EP For Your Validation sold out in ten minutes?

elements.title: Buster Maddox
elements.contents: ... that despite being named in college as the best at his position in the U.S., football player Buster Maddox only appeared in one NFL game?

elements.title: Lux
elements.contents: ... that the Doctor Who episode "Lux" is set in Miami, Florida, despite being filmed in Penarth, Wales?

elements.title: Jean-Mohammed Abd-el-Jalil
elements.contents: ... that Jean-Mohammed Abd-el-Jalil, a Moroccan Franciscan friar, was permitted by the Pope to keep "Muhammad" as his baptismal name?

elements.title: Robert Mugabe's motorcade
elements.contents: ... that Robert Mugabe's motorcade was known for speeding and killing people?

elements.title: election as the first female Brooklyn District Attorney
elements.contents: ... that Elizabeth Holtzman's opponent ran an ad saying "maybe I'd like to have her as a daughter, but not as a DA" before her election as the first female Brooklyn District Attorney?

elements.title: Morton D. Magoffin
elements.contents: ... that fighter pilot Morton D. Magoffin made pilots in his group sprint around an airfield for not saluting him?
